original: rtsha gsum don khrid kyi gsol 'debs bzhugs so //
analyzed: rtsha gsum don khrid kyi gsol debs bzhugs so

original: na mo gu ru /
analyzed: na mo gu ru

original: dmigs med spros bral bde chen zhing khams der //
analyzed: dmigs med spros bral bde chen zhing khams der

original: chos sku snang ba mtha' yas la gsol ba 'debs //
analyzed: chos sku snang ba mtha yas la gsol ba debs

original: blo 'das chos sku thob par byin gyis rlobs //
analyzed: blo da chos sku thob ba byin gyis rlobs

original: shar phyogs ri bo ta la'i pho brang du //
analyzed: char phyogs ri bo ta la pho brang du

original: longs sku spyan ras gzigs la gsol ba 'debs //
analyzed: longs sku spyan ras gzigs la gsol ba debs

original: 'od gsal lhun grub rtogs par byin gyis rlobs //
analyzed: d gsal lhun grub rtogs ba byin gyis rlobs

original: rnga yab pad+ma 'od kyi gzhal yas su //
analyzed: rnga yab pad+ma d kyi jal yas su

original: sprul sku pad+ma 'byung gnas la gsol ba 'debs //
analyzed: sprul sku pad+ma byung gnas la gsol ba debs

original: tshhe 'dir rig 'dzin thob par byin gyis rlobs //
analyzed: tshhe dir rig dzin thob ba byin gyis rlobs

analyzed: nyi shu rtsha bzhi mkha gro gnas mchog tu

original: mkha' 'gro ye shes mtshho rgyal la gsol ba 'debs //
analyzed: mkha gro ye shes mtshho rgyal la gsol ba debs

original: bde stong zung 'jug rtogs par byin gyis rlobs //
analyzed: bde stong zung jug rtogs ba byin gyis rlobs

analyzed: chos khor bde chen gling gi pho brang du

original: gter ston rat+na gling pa la gsol ba 'debs //
analyzed: gter ston rat+na gling ba la gsol ba debs

analyzed: bdag gzhan don gnyis grub ba byin gyis rlobs

analyzed: spyi gtshug nyi zla pad+ma gdan steng du

original: drin chen rtsha ba'i bla ma la gsol ba 'debs //
analyzed: drin chen rtsha ba bla ma la gsol ba debs

analyzed: bdag brgyud smin cing grol ba byin gyis rlobs

analyzed: rang byung lhun grub rtogs ba byin gyis rlobs
